ACK 6c223152238d2e818e38357b03f38a4dbe9de016, I have reviewed the code and it looks OK, I agree it can be merged.

diff_hunk:
@@ -58,8 +58,8 @@ VIAddVersionKey ProductVersion "@PACKAGE_VERSION@"
 VIAddVersionKey CompanyName "${COMPANY}"
 VIAddVersionKey CompanyWebsite "${URL}"
 VIAddVersionKey FileVersion "@PACKAGE_VERSION@"
-VIAddVersionKey FileDescription ""
-VIAddVersionKey LegalCopyright ""
+VIAddVersionKey FileDescription "Installer for @PACKAGE_NAME@"
+VIAddVersionKey LegalCopyright "@COPYRIGHT_HOLDERS_FINAL@"

@@ -58,8 +58,8 @@ VIAddVersionKey ProductVersion "@PACKAGE_VERSION@"

body: I don't really care, but sure.
